annonsrubrik: Swedish speaking B2B sales for Google Ads in Dublin
annonstext:
Are you sales-oriented, target-driven, and up for a new career opportunity in a multinational technology company? – then keep reading!

                                    
Are you sales-oriented, target-driven and up for a new career opportunity in a multinational technology company? – then keep reading!

On behalf of our client, Lingocruit is now recruiting Swedish speakers to work on their project for Google Ads. Our client specializes in Internet-related services and cloud technology and helps global brands provide a great experience for their customers, build customer loyalty, and grow their business.

This position is a B2B role in which you will be working with exisiting Google Ad clients, guiding them in their marketing campaigns, providing them with strategies and improvements to achieve the best possible results for both. You will build strong and lasting relationships with your portfolio of clients through excellent communication, all the while working towards set KPI's for you and your team.

*Your safety is important to us! Our client has made sure the necessary precautions have been taken in accordance to the rules and guidelines set and provide a safe onboarding and relocation.**

Main responsibilities

 	Analyze, strategize and upsell the accounts
 	Work towards individual targets as well as team targets
 	Navigate your clients through Google Ads and implement campaign improvement
 	Build lasting relationships with your clients

Your current skill set

 	Native Swedish speaker
 	Excellent level of English
 	Business and solution oriented
 	Great written and verbal communication skills
 	Previous experience with sales, digital marketing or advertising is advantageous

Your new employer offers

 	Attractive salary between 30,000€ – 34,000€ annually
 	Commisions
 	Relocation package including flight and temporary accomodation
 	Health insurance
 	Permanent contract
 	Modern and vibrant office space
 	International and multicultural work environment

About Dublin

The cozy capital of Ireland, ranked as the city with the most friendly people in the world, has plenty to offer for everyone. Famous for its countless pubs, city life, shopping, and being a hub for global tech companies, adding to the already international nature of the city. The yearly St. Patrick's day celebration is also an experience that shouldn't be missed!

Want to know more?

Send in your application in English today and get in touch with us! We look forward to speaking with you and telling you more about this opportunity!

Arbetstiden är 38 timmar per vecka
Tillsvidare
